DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal international non-interventional study investigate therapeutic effectiveness vardenafil ( film-coated tablet ) Erectile Dysfunction patient Metabolic Syndrome daily clinical practice . It include large number patient various underlying condition different cultural demographic background different geographic area .
DOC.brief_title: Therapeutic Effectiveness Vardenafil Patients With Erectile Dysfunction Metabolic Syndrome Daily Clinical Practice
DOC.criteria: Erectile Dysfunction ( ED ) patient newly prescribe vardenafil ( Levitra filmcoated tablet ) accordance term local marketing authorization . Diagnosis erectile dysfunction discretion physician , base patient ED history . No use Phosphodiesterase Type 5 ( PDE5 ) inhibitor within 1 month study entry . Documented Metabolic Syndrome ( MetS ) , preferably accord definition International Diabetes Foundation . Do follow contraindication warning Summary Product Characteristics .
